item.title: DeepSeek’s Direct Challenge to Antitrust Orthodoxy
item.description: The Chinese company’s R1 sent shockwaves through the tech world.

item.title: The Persecuted Must Survive the Wrecking Ball
item.description: JD Vance suggests that religious freedom worldwide is a priority for the second Trump administration.

item.title: Now Is the Time to Defund Planned Parenthood
item.description: It would be another major step in establishing a culture of human dignity and ensuring every citizen’s unalienable rights.

item.title: Republicans Should Keep Taxes Simple
item.description: Injecting new carve-outs into the code would undermine one of the great successes of President Trump’s first term.

item.title: Trump’s Countermarch Through the Institutions
item.description: For those keeping score, it’s Trump 1, Marcuse 0.
